SEARCH
Package Control

Class ApplicationControl

java.lang.Object
Control.ApplicationControl
public class ApplicationControl extends Object
Controls all application-related operations in the system. Manages student applications for internships, including submission, approval/rejection, acceptance decisions, and withdrawal requests. Coordinates with InternshipControl to update internship slot availability.

All CSV operations use proper field escaping to handle special characters in application data, ensuring data integrity across the application lifecycle.

Version:
2.0
Author:
Allen

    • ApplicationControl

  • Method Details

    • getApplicationsForDisplay

      public List<String> getApplicationsForDisplay()
      Gets formatted application strings for display in the UI. Returns all applications currently loaded in memory (either student-specific or all applications depending on which load method was called).
      Returns:
      list of formatted application strings using Application.toString()

    • loadAllApplicationsFromDB

      public void loadAllApplicationsFromDB()
      Loads all applications from the database regardless of student. Used by Career Staff to review all applications, handle withdrawals, and perform system-wide application management. Uses proper CSV parsing to handle fields with special characters. Clears existing applications before loading.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if user not logged in
      IllegalArgumentException - if user is not Career Staff
      See Also:
      • for student-specific loading

    • loadStudentApplicationFromDB

      public void loadStudentApplicationFromDB()
      Loads applications for the logged-in student from the database.

    • makeApplication

      public int makeApplication(String internshipID)
      Creates a new internship application for the logged-in student. Performs multiple validation checks before creating the application: - User must be logged in as a student - Student must not have already accepted an internship offer - Internship must be visible, not full, and not rejected - Student must meet the internship requirements (year, major, level) - Student must not have already applied to this internship - Student must not have more than one approved application - Student must not have reached the maximum of 3 active applications
      Parameters:
      internshipID - the ID of the internship to apply for
      Returns:
      the application number assigned to the new application
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if user is not logged in, not a student, has accepted an offer, has an approved application, has reached the 3-application limit, or internship is not available
      IllegalArgumentException - if internshipID is null or empty

    • getApplicationStatus

      void getApplicationStatus()
      Gets the application status. (Ditched method)

    • hasAcceptedOffer

      public boolean hasAcceptedOffer()
      Checks if the logged-in student has accepted any internship offer. Looks for applications where acceptance is set to "yes".
      Returns:
      true if student has accepted at least one offer, false otherwise

    • hasApprovedApplication

      public boolean hasApprovedApplication()
      Checks if the logged-in student has any approved applications. Used to enforce the rule that students can only have one approved application before deciding to accept or reject the offer.
      Returns:
      true if student has at least one approved application, false otherwise

    • getApprovedApplicationInternshipCompaniesAndIDs

      public List<String> getApprovedApplicationInternshipCompaniesAndIDs()
      Gets a list of company names and internship IDs for all approved applications. Used to display to students which offers they need to respond to.
      Returns:
      list of strings in format "CompanyName (ID: InternshipID)" for each approved application

    • acceptOffer

      public void acceptOffer(int appNum)
      Accepts an approved internship offer on behalf of the logged-in student. Updates the application status, student's acceptance status in the database, adds the student to the internship's accepted list, and automatically withdraws (sets withdrawStatus to "approved") all other applications from the same student. Note: Other applications retain their original status (pending/approved/rejected), allowing students to reapply if they later withdraw the accepted offer.
      Parameters:
      appNum - the application number to accept
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if application is not found or not approved

    • rejectOffer

      public void rejectOffer(int appNum)
      Rejects an approved internship offer on behalf of the logged-in student. Updates the application's acceptance status to "no". Does not update the student's overall acceptance status as they may have other pending offers.
      Parameters:
      appNum - the application number to reject
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if application is not found or not approved

    • requestWithdrawApplication

      public void requestWithdrawApplication(int appNum)
      Submits a withdrawal request for an application. Sets the withdraw status to "pending" for staff review. Cannot withdraw if a previous withdrawal was rejected or already approved.
      Parameters:
      appNum - the application number to request withdrawal for
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if application is not found
      IllegalStateException - if withdrawal already approved, pending, or previously rejected

    • viewInternshipsAppliedTo

      public List<String> viewInternshipsAppliedTo()
      Gets detailed information about all internships the student has applied to. Includes application number and full internship details for each application.
      Returns:
      list of formatted strings with application and internship details

    • getApplicationsWithInternshipDetails

      public List<String> getApplicationsWithInternshipDetails()
      Gets applications with internship details in structured format for table display. Returns pipe-delimited strings with all relevant application and internship fields.
      Returns:
      list of formatted strings suitable for parsing into UI table rows

    • getPendingWithdrawals

      public List<String> getPendingWithdrawals()
      Gets all applications that have pending withdrawal requests. Used by Career Staff to review and approve/reject withdrawal requests.
      Returns:
      list of formatted strings for each pending withdrawal application
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if user not logged in
      IllegalArgumentException - if user is not Career Staff

    • rejectWithdrawalByNumber

      void rejectWithdrawalByNumber(int appNum)
      Rejects a withdrawal request for the specified application. Marks the withdrawal status as rejected.
      Parameters:
      appNum - the application number to reject withdrawal for
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if application is not found

    • approveWithdrawal

      public void approveWithdrawal(String appNumStr)
      Approves a withdrawal request (UI-friendly wrapper accepting String). Parses the application number string and delegates to the int version.
      Parameters:
      appNumStr - the application number as a string
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if user not logged in
      IllegalArgumentException - if user is not Career Staff or invalid application number

    • rejectWithdrawal

      public void rejectWithdrawal(String appNumStr)
      UI-friendly wrapper: accepts application number as String, parses and delegates. Only Career Staff can reject withdrawals.
      Parameters:
      appNumStr - the application number as a string
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if user is not logged in
      IllegalArgumentException - if user is not Career Staff or if application number is invalid

    • handleWithdrawalDecision

      void handleWithdrawalDecision(String appNumStr, String decisionStr)
      Handles a withdrawal decision with string inputs.
      Parameters:
      appNumStr - the application number as a string
      decisionStr - the decision as a string (approve/reject, y/n, etc.)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if inputs are invalid

    • approveApplicationByNumber

      void approveApplicationByNumber(int appNum)
      Approves an application by application number.
      Parameters:
      appNum - the application number to approve
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if application is not found

    • rejectApplicationByNumber

      void rejectApplicationByNumber(int appNum)
      Rejects an application by application number.
      Parameters:
      appNum - the application number to reject
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if application is not found

    • approveWithdrawal

      void approveWithdrawal(int appNum)
      Approves a withdrawal request for an application. When a withdrawal is approved, this method now also removes ALL applications from this student from the system (both from application_list and from internship opportunity lists), allowing the student to reapply fresh.
      Parameters:
      appNum - the application number
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if application is not found

    • withdrawOtherApplicationsOfApprovedStudent

      void withdrawOtherApplicationsOfApprovedStudent(String studentID, int acceptedAppNum)
      Withdraws all other applications for a student who has accepted an offer. When a student accepts one internship offer, all their other applications are automatically withdrawn (withdrawStatus set to "approved") but their application status (pending/approved/rejected) remains unchanged. This allows students to reapply if they later withdraw their accepted offer.
      Parameters:
      studentID - the student ID
      acceptedAppNum - the application number that was accepted (to skip)

    • getApplicationByNumber

      Application getApplicationByNumber(int appNumber)
      Gets an application by its number.
      Parameters:
      appNumber - the application number
      Returns:
      the Application object or null if not found

    • rejectUnansweredApprovedApplicationsForInternship

      void rejectUnansweredApprovedApplicationsForInternship(String internshipID, List<Integer> acceptedApps)
      Rejects all approved but unanswered applications for a specific internship.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - the internship ID
      acceptedApps - list of accepted application numbers to exclude

    • getNextApplicationNumber

      private int getNextApplicationNumber()
      Get the next available application number by reading all applications from the database and finding the maximum application number, then returning max + 1.
      Returns:
      the next available application number

    • loadApplicationByNumberFromDB

      private Application loadApplicationByNumberFromDB(int appNumber)
      Loads an application by number from the database.
      Parameters:
      appNumber - the application number
      Returns:
      the Application object or null

    • saveApplicationsToDB

      private void saveApplicationsToDB()
      Saves applications to the database.

    • deleteApplicationsFromDB

      private void deleteApplicationsFromDB(List<Integer> applicationNumbersToDelete)
      Permanently deletes applications from the database by application numbers. This method reads all applications, removes those matching the provided numbers, and writes the remaining applications back to the CSV file.
      Parameters:
      applicationNumbersToDelete - set of application numbers to remove from database

    • updateInternshipsApplicationsInDB

      private void updateInternshipsApplicationsInDB(int applicationNumber, String internshipID, String action)
      Updates internship applications in the database.
      Parameters:
      applicationNumber - the application number
      internshipID - the internship ID
      action - the action (add/remove)

    • getStudentAcceptanceStatus

      private boolean getStudentAcceptanceStatus(String studentID)
      Get the student's hasAcceptedInternshipOpportunity status from student.csv
      Parameters:
      studentID - the ID of the student
      Returns:
      true if the student has accepted an internship opportunity, false otherwise

    • updateStudentAcceptanceStatus

      private void updateStudentAcceptanceStatus(String studentID, boolean hasAccepted)
      Update the student's hasAcceptedInternshipOpportunity field in student.csv
      Parameters:
      studentID - the ID of the student
      hasAccepted - the acceptance status to update
